email.subject: RE: Hacker Wars Join Request
email.body:
Hi there #PLAYERNAME#,
I'm the assistant administrator and coordinator here at Hacker Wars. I'm contacting you about your request to join Hacker Wars and I'm sorry to be the one to tell you this, but your application has been declined.
We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused you and wish you the best of luck in the future.
Yours Sincerely, - Judith Thomas Hacker Wars Centre Coordinator
